Tiles.Text: A few powerful executives are making doctors lie to us in order to make money off of medicine.
Humans have lived for millenia without modern medicine.
If humans lived for a long time before modern medicine, there must be natural remedies for illnesses.
Since there are natural remedies for all illnesses, our doctors must be lying to us.
A few medicine companies dominate the market.
Since a few companies dominate the market, power is concentrated in a few executives.
There is no evidence of the malevolence of pharmaceutical executives.
If there is no evidence of the malevolence of executives, that just means that there's a huge coverup.
Since there is huge coverup, then that proves the power of a few executives.
